sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import './lang.json'; import { Title, Subtitle, Text, CoverText, Signature, Iconic } from './components/Text/Text'; import { MenuBar, MenuBarItem } from './components/MenuBar/MenuBar'; import { Image, ImageRow } from './components/Image/Image'; import { ImageGallery } from './components/ImageGallery/ImageGallery'; import { Hexagon } from './components/Hexagon/Hexagon'; import { BackVideo } from './components/BackVideo/BackVideo'; import { ImageRowItem } from './objects/ImageRowItem'; function App() { var lang = require('./lang.json'); var host = window.location.href; var language = ((host.substr(host.lastIndexOf(".") + 1)) === 'dk') ? 'da' : 'en'; var t = lang[language]; var trees = [ new ImageRowItem(t.ux.tree1, "tree_1"), new ImageRowItem(t.ux.tree2, "tree_2"), new ImageRowItem(t.ux.tree3, "tree_3"), new ImageRowItem(t.ux.tree4, "tree_4") ]; return (
<Text color="white" text={t.skills.text1}/> </div> <ImageGallery/> </div> <div id="ux" className="Section"> <div position="paragraph" className="Container"> <Title text={t.ux.title}/> <Text size="small" text={t.ux.text1}/> <ImageRow items={trees}/> </div> </div> <div id="projects" className="Section"> <div position="paragraph" className="Container"> <Title text={t.projects.title}/> <Text size="small" text={t.projects.text1}/> <Hexagon></Hexagon> </div> </div> <div id="contact" className="Section"> <div position="paragraph" className="Container"> <Title text={t.contact.title}/> <Text text={t.contact.text1}/> <Text text={t.contact.text2}/> </div> </div> <div id="footer" className="Section"></div> </div> ); } export default App;
